description: TODO: replace this row with real hypotheses
Childhood emotional abuse associates with lower adult self-love scores.
predictors: during ages *0-12*: your parents verbally or emotionally abused you (mds78zu)
population/subset: Adults with non-missing outcome and predictor responses
estimand: Survey-weighted mean difference in self-love score across abuse frequency categories

description: Higher perceived childhood class associates with higher current net worth category.
population/subset: Adults with non-missing childhood class and net worth data
estimand: Survey-weighted ordered logit comparing net worth categories across childhood class levels
notes: Confidence rating: Low (requires ordinal coding confirmation).

description: Active religious practice is associated with preferring monogamy.
predictors: Do you *currently* actively practice a religion? (902tbll)
controls: selfage;gendermale;Are you in a romantic relationship?
population/subset: Adults with non-missing monogamy, religion practice, and relationship status responses
estimand: Simple random sample proportional-odds cumulative logit comparing monogamy preference levels across religious practice categories
notes: Confidence rating: Medium (SRS PAP ordered-logit spec updated 2025-10-16T14:52:06Z; awaiting survey-weight metadata under T-003).

description: History of mental health diagnosis associates with current emotional work/social difficulty.
outcome_var: "In the past *4 weeks*, you've had difficulty accomplishing things in work or social activities due to *emotional issues* (such as depression, anxiety, etc) (kd4qc3z)"
predictors: Have you been diagnosed with any of the following (njjh37w)
population/subset: Adults responding to emotional difficulty item
estimand: Survey-weighted mean difference (or ordinal regression) in emotional difficulty score by diagnosis status
